name: Extra Toiletpaper (E.T.)
description:
Install instructions

To play: Drag and drop a unit into their battle positions, each player can only move a certain spaces depending on the type. Drag and drop again if you want to change the path. Once you’ve settled on where to place the hero, click move. If you want to attack without moving a character, simply click them and press move without dragging the character.
To attack click on an enemy in range and press Attack.

Game programmed by Sebastian Salazar

Art and animation by Bailey Gwartney

Music and sound effects by: euqrs
